Your Neighbors Are Going Solar. You Can Join Them.
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Thinking about going solar? The time is now!
Join the 73 people in Plainfield, Ashfield and Buckland who have already gone solar through Solarize Plainfield-Ashfield-Buckland (PAB) before it ends, and help us make it the most successful Western Massachusetts program in history!
Hurry, there are only 2 weeks left to go solar at Solarize PAB’s incredibly low group price! The program ends on September 30th, 2015.
Don’t miss out on an incredible opportunity many of your neighbors have already jumped on.
If you are already working with a Solar Consultant, then please contact him or her. To request a free site evaluation, call Direct Energy Solar at 800-903-6130.
Many thanks to the PAB Solar Coaches for their enthusiasm, guidance and support during this program. If you have any questions, please contact the appropriate Solar Coach for your community:
Tim Walter, Plainfield Solar Coach, 634-8098, timpaulwalter@hotmail.com
Jim Cutler, Ashfield Solar Coach, 625-2097, snowalkerjim@gmail.com
Ellen Kaufman, Buckland Solar Coach, 625-9708, ellenruthk@gmail.com
Contact Us: 800-903-6130 Your Sun. Your Power. Your Way.
